properties.name: moments.serviceBasePath
properties.description: Base path on which this app is intented to be accessed. Used to generate URLs.

properties.name: moments.auth.jwtRefreshExpirationMs
properties.description: JWT refresh expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: moments.discord.channelID
properties.description: Channel ID where bot sends post notifications.

properties.name: moments.discord.postReferenceLink
properties.description: URL with {id} placeholder used to create link displayed in post notifications.

properties.name: moments.discord.defaultAvatarLink
properties.description: Link to default avatar image displayed in discord post notifications.

properties.name: moments.mail.accountActivationFromID
properties.description: Value of 'from' field used in account activation mails.

properties.name: moments.mail.passwordResetFromID
properties.description: Value of 'from' field used in password reset mails.
